favourite.article: This song touches me deeply its such a sweet pray to the Lord. This song makes me want to get alone with the Lord and pray it over and over to Him. This song is what I've been longing for. O Lord Jesus remove all hidden things that block my vision.
Praise the Lord that You are the living God. Thank You Lord for Your growth.

Lord Jesus draw me one step further. I can't even get past the first line of this song. Lord, draw each and every one of us just one step further. Save us from the mud our foot is stuck in right now. We need You to draw us to take the next step. Lord, don't let whatever we are going through be wasted. We just need You Lord. Thank You for the Body, the one place we must always go to seek You. Lord, we love You no matter how far away we are right now. Lord, draw us one step further right now.

praise you Lord for leading me to this song today...this is my prayer, this is my need-to be drawn one step further,from where I am, that the Lord continue to expose and transform me, may everything work to save me more, and may everything that blocks my vision be burned away.
Simply wonderful. Lord, You are wonderful. How much we need You! OH LORD JESUS!

Woah! I just googled "draw me near to the burnings of Your heart, as that's what I've been longing for, and this song came up. So precisely what I've been contending for. This is powerful. Hallelujah Father. For everyone feeling hungry in a desert season, Father I pray that Your Spirit would bestow upon them beauty for ashes! Joy for mourning! Praise for heaviness! O God! Show Yourself strong. Reveal Yourself as the Faithful and True Witness! Hallelujah! Maranatha! Amen! :)

I learned this song before but recently the Lord gave it to me anew as my prayer to Him when I didn't know how to pray. I like the last stanza very much. It's about realizing the Lord is always present with us as the Body. Our need of Him and His need is met more fully when we are moved by Him to experience the Body of Christ more. I will seek Him there always! This is very high but normal in our experience, isn't it?

Amen. May the Lord draw us further from where we are. Praise Him for His sovereign mercy! This song portrays the prayer of a thankful person to the Lord. Whenever I sing this song to the Lord, I can really feel His presence drawing me. It reminds me that He is everything I need and that He is ever present all the time.
So nice. I like it because it matches my condition now. Lord Jesus, draw me one step further for Your sake and the gospel's sake.

Wow, this song is so good. Lord draw us one step further. We don't want to remain lukewarm. Make us burning for You. Remove all things that block the heavenly vision. We want to see more of You. Thank You Lord.
'O Lord, do draw us one step further, draw us Lord from where we are'. How we just need to give ourselves to the Lord, so that He may impart more of his life into us! Praise Him!

This song really expresses the deep experiences of Christ. When He speaks, He speaks so softly, yet at the same time He burns within, the only thing we can do is stop and listen to what He wants to say. Sometimes He touches me about my thoughts and self-ambition and pride.. He is slowly exposing and burning them away. Whatevers not of Him, must be burned away. His Spirit is transforming me and saving me day by day. Lord, I just want to remain open to Your spreading in my being.
We like this song because it brings us more to His presence.
I LOVE this song! we should be drawn away... to the Lord! Praise the Lord! Hallelujah!
we should ask the Lord daily to draw us closer to Him! We really need Him, in order for us to grow! and to be builded up with one another! for His Body! Amen!!!

Praise the Lord! Draw us more today! May we never be content of where we are but always pursue to draw near to Him in all situations in all circumstances. Lord, transform us, saturate us that we may become your image!
i really like this song.... praise the lord continue to enjoy CHRIST....
